claim:
Results
The network graph in Fig. 2
is a document citation network which shows how the AV research field is structured by considering the last five decades of scientific publication output and its main thematic research areas.
title: Fig. 2.
caption: Document citation network and thematic clusters. The size of each cluster is expressed in percentage of publications.
